sections.title: Main
sections.content:
--- title: "DSPA2: Data Science and Predictive Analytics (UMich HS650)" subtitle: "

Convert Rmd to R

" author: "

SOCR/MIDAS (Ivo Dinov)

" date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%B %Y')`" tags: [DSPA, SOCR, MIDAS, Big Data, Predictive Analytics] output: html_document: theme: spacelab highlight: tango includes: before_body: SOCR_header.html after_body: SOCR_footer_tracker.html toc: true number_sections: true toc_depth: 2 toc_float: collapsed: false This section shows the process of converting Rmd to pure R by prefixing all markup text with comments (#) and removing the R *starting* and *ending* delimeters. Invocation protocol is: `rmd2rscript("C:\\Users\\dinov\\Desktop\\Ivo.dir\\Research\\UMichigan\\Publications_Books\\2023\\DSPA_Springer_2nd_Edition_2023\\Rmd_HTML\\01_Introduction.Rmd", "C:\\Users\\dinov\\Desktop\\Ivo.dir\\Research\\UMichigan\\Publications_Books\\2023\\DSPA_Springer_2nd_Edition_2023\\Rmd_HTML\\R_code\\01_Introduction.R")`
